title: Cherry almond loaf
ingredients: ['125g butter', '125g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '75g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '100g ground almonds', '50g ground rice', '200g glace cherries', 'flaked almonds', 'icing sugar for dusting']
